views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13

Requires CCSupport

CCModules is a tweak that adds third party app modules and utility modules to the iOS control center.

More control center modules for iOS 11/12/13. The modules support 3D Touch quick actions. There are 100+ modules.

Note that the modules will only display if you have the app.

New in v1.5-1: Fix for Tiny Volume and Silent Mode modules causing issues. New in v1.5: Full iOS 13 support, added Books and Shortcuts modules, and minor bug fixes. New in CCModules v1.4-2:
• arm64e/A12 compatibility, CCModules should now also be future proofed
• Low Power Mode module for iPads
• Minor module fixes
New in v1.3-1
- Fixed the Tiny Volume and Tiny Brightness version display names.


New in CCModules v1.3
- Changed Clock and iCleaner icons, fixed Discord module, and fixed the iOS 11.0 - 11.1.2 safe mode occurring. Note that in this version, the ID for Tiny Volume and Tiny Brightness has been changed, please add them again in Settings according to your iOS version.
New in CCModules v1.2-14 -
Fixed the Tiny Brightness and Tiny Volume modules. Also added Balance My Checkbook, SiriusXM, and SwiftKey modules.

Screenshot, Reduce White Point, WiFi, and Bluetooth modules will be added as soon as I get theos working again. • Added Lock Device, Google Link, App Store Search, and magicApp modules. The Google Link module launches google.com from Safari when pressed. A few icon changes were made as well; one being the Location Services module is now blue.
• Added a Google Authenticator module
• Fixed a random respring issue


• Added Reboot, Safe Mode, Google Translate, and Swarm modules.


• Added Google, Google Assistant, KKBox, LINE, NewTerm 2, PayPal, Private Browser, Shazam, Time2, Viber, and Location Services modules. Keep the module requests coming! • Added Tiny AirPlay module


New in CCModules v1.2-6: 1Password module is fixed.


New in CCModules v1.2-5: Silo is no longer supported; CCSupport is required. Minor bug fixes.
